price: 95. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Tallaahi! Waxaad ku sugan tahay gefkaagii hore.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
